changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder, if there is no information on the update, it is because it concerns only the update of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Suppression du refresh automatique des i: Removal of the automatic refresh of information every hour to limit the number of calls to Ajax and prevent quota overrun
changelog.md.Optimisation de l'installation des dépen: Optimization of the installation of dependencies
changelog.md.Correction de la gestion des couleurs de: Correction of the color management of the equipment
changelog.md.Ajout du Dual Curtain Outdoor: Addition of the Dual Curtain Outdoor
changelog.md.Gestion de la couleur des modules pour a: Color management of the modules to display the correct image (need to redo a synchronization
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis sur les entrées e: Correction of a problem on the external inputs of DoorProtect (a removal of the equipment and resynchronization is necessary
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis sur le démon SIA: Fixed a problem with the SIA daemon
changelog.md.Ajout des commandes on\/off pour les rel: Added on / off commands for relays
changelog.md.Ajout d'un démon SIA pour la recuperatio: Addition of a SIA daemon for the local recovery of certain information (read the documentation for the configuration
changelog.md.Decalage aléatoire du cron de refresh po: Random shift of the refresh cron to try to correct the problem "You have exceeded the limit in 100 requests per minute

index.md.Pour avoir une remontée en temps réel il: To have a real-time feedback, it is ABSOLUTELY necessary that your Jeedom be accessible from the outside (external access URL used
index.md.La configuration du plugin est très simp: The configuration of the plugin is very simple and takes place in 2 steps
index.md.mise en place du lien entre votre jeedom: setting up the link between your jeedom and your alarm
index.md.ajout d'un partage par mail pour la remo: addition of an email sharing for reporting events
index.md.Un point important Ajax ne remonte pas d: An important point Ajax does not raise a global alert when an alarm is triggered but does raise the status on the detector which triggered the alarm (events command
index.md.Le démon sert uniquement pour la partie: The daemon is only used for the SIA part
index.md.Si vous le désactivez vous aurez toujour: If you deactivate it, you will still have information coming back from the cloud
index.md.Vous pouvez donc le desactiver si vous n: You can therefore deactivate it if you do not use the SIA part
index.md.la liste des modules compatible avec le: the list of modules compatible with the plugin
index.md.Pour la mise en place du lien entre votr: To set up the link between your Jeedom and your Ajax alarm, go to "Plugin" -> "Plugin management" -> "Ajax System" then click on "Connect", you enter your Ajax identifiers and click on "Validate
index.md.Si vous avez un compte pro il ne faut su: If you have a professional account, you shouldn't use it here, you absolutely have to use a simple user account
index.md.Jeedom ne sauvegarde absolument pas vos: Jeedom absolutely does not save your Ajax credentials
index.md.ils sont juste une utilisés pour la prem: they are just one used for the first request to Ajax and have the access token and the refresh token
index.md.Le refresh token permet de récupérer un: The refresh token makes it possible to recover a new access token which has a lifespan of only a few hours
index.md.Une fois le lien fait toute les requetes: Once the link is made all the requests go through our cloud but at no time does the cloud store your access token, so it is not possible with only the jeedom cloud to act on your alarm
index.md.Pour toute action sur celle-ci il faut a: For any action on this, you absolutely need the combination of your Jeedom's access token and a key known only to our cloud
index.md.Il faut depuis l'application Ajax aller: From the Ajax application, go to the hub then in settings (small cogwheel at the top right) go to user and add the user
index.md.L'invitation reste et restera toujours e: The invitation remains and will always remain pending, this is normal
index.md.Une fois la configuration sur \"Plugin\": Once the configuration is on "Plugin" -> "Plugin management" -> "Ajax System" you just have to synchronize, Jeedom will automatically create all Ajax equipment linked to your Ajax account
index.md.Petit specificité pour le detecteur de m: Small specificity for the motion detector, it does not go up to the detection of movement permanently
index.md.En effet il ne le remonte que lorsque l': In fact, it only goes up when the alarm is active and by the event command
index.md.Pour lui pas de soucis, vous avez l'état: For him no worries, you have real-time status of window / door open / closed information
index.md.Cette fonctionalitée n'est pour le momen: This feature is currently not compatible with RPIs, and does not seem to work correctly with Debian 11 (which is currently not officially compatible with jeedom because too many plugins do not support it
index.md.Il est possible aussi de relier l'alarme: It is also possible to connect the Ajax alarm to Jeedom by the SIA protocol, which has the advantage of being local (no cloud) but which can only receive information (no alarm control possible
index.md.cannot import name 'CommunicationsProtoc: cannot import name 'CommunicationsProtocol' from 'pysiaalarm' you must go to "Settings" -> "System" -> "Configuration" then "OS / DB" tab then in "System Tools" click on "Open" in front of "System Administration
index.md.Et faire la commande `sudo pip3 install: And do the command `sudo pip3 install pysiaalarm == 3.0.0b9`
index.md.La configuration du SIA est assez simple: The configuration of the SIA is quite simple, in "Plugin" -> "Plugin management" -> "Ajax Systems", you will have
index.md.Il faut ensuite aller sur l'application: You must then go to the Ajax Systeme application (from your phone), go to "Devices" then click on the hub, go to its configuration (cogwheel at the top right), go to "Monitoring center "and fill in the information
index.md.mettre l'ip local de Jeedom: put the local ip of Jeedom
index.md.Vous pouvez changer aussi la fréquence d: You can also change the service test frequency from 1min to 24h (to reduce the load on your Jeedom
index.md.Normalement si tout est bon vous devriez: Normally if all is well you should see the "Central Station" change to "Connected
index.md.Certaine information ne remontent que si: Certain information is only returned if the AIS is configured
index.md.Dans la configuration du plugin vous ave: In the configuration of the plugin you have the possibility to pass for the SIA part in mqtt, there is voluntarily no explanation of how because the implementation is relatively complex
index.md.L'option est la pour répondre à un besoi: The option is there to meet a customer need only
